code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Register(_ref){let{onRegister}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[referralCode,setReferralCode]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/auth/register',{email,password,username,referralCode});onRegister(res.data.userId);}catch(err){alert('Đăng ký thất bại');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u0110\u0103ng k\xFD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"T\xEAn ng\u01B0\u1EDDi d\xF9ng",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"M\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u",type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"M\xE3 gi\u1EDBi thi\u1EC7u (n\u1EBFu c\xF3)",value:referralCode,onChange:e=>setReferralCode(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,children:"\u0110\u0103ng k\xFD"})]});}export default Register;
